Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Eating
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Eating
Important Commands: drink, eat, empty, fill, nibble, sip, smell, taste
Food is available in many Skotos games and Theatres. Servants, cooks, and bartenders dispense a variety of delicacies.
The verbs $(udat.chatchar)SMELL and $(udat.chatchar)TASTE can be used on all types of food. In order to eat very slowly a guest may $(udat.chatchar)NIBBLE food or $(udat.chatchar)SIP drink. To take larger bites or drinks you may $(udat.chatchar)EAT or $(udat.chatchar)DRINK. Finally, drinks may be finished off in one big gulp with the $(udat.chatchar)GULP command.
In rooms with bars, drinks may be refilled with the $(udat.chatchar)FILL command.
See Also: CNPCs
